segments.text: Fine , thank you . Are you coming for the interview as a secretary ? What's your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please allow me to introduce myself . My name is Li Hua . Nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you , too . Miss Li . please have a seat . I am Peter Smith , the General Manager .
segments.speaker: S2
